contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|skylight}} '''[[Skylight]]''' is a means of daylighting. '''Skylight''' may also refer to: * [[Skylight (play)|''Skylight'' (play)]], by David Hare * Skylight of a [[lava tube]], a hole in the ceiling of the tube * [[Skylight, Arkansas]] * ''Skylight'', a short film by [[David Clayton Rogers]] * [[Skylight Pictures]], a film company * [[Skylight Opera Theatre]], an opera company in Milwaukee, Wisconsin * [[Skylight 1A]], a photographic filter factor that absorbs ultraviolet radiation * [[Lenovo Skylight]], a cancelled project for a small portable computer with mobile telephone * [[Mount Skylight]], in the Adirondack Mountains of New York ==See also== * [[Diffuse sky radiation]] * [[Light pollution]] {{disambiguation}}
